snippet: Lei Zhengfu, a former Communist Party official in the city of Chongqing, insisted during an appeals hearing on Friday that he had not taken bribes.
abstract: Lei Zhengfu, former Chinese Communist Party official convicted of accepting bribes to help businessman Xiao Ye, insists during appeals hearing that he did not do so; Lei was sentenced to 13 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Lei Zhengfu, a former Communist Party official in the city of Chongqing, insisted during an appeals hearing on Friday that he had not taken bribes.
